articles.title: Watch: Gabriel Sterling describes moment he 'lost it' after threats of violence - CNN Video
articles.description: Georgia election official Gabriel Sterling describes the threatening tweet that directly led him to address then-President Donald Trump during a press conference in December of 2020.

articles.author: Cheri Mossburg, CNN
articles.title: Jury finds Bill Cosby guilty of sexual battery in decades-old incident
articles.description: A Los Angeles jury found embattled comedian Bill Cosby guilty in a civil trial filed by Judy Huth, a woman who claimed he sexually assaulted her as a teenager in the 1970s.

articles.author: Marshall Cohen, Jeremy Herb and Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: 7 takeaways from the fourth day of the January 6 hearings
articles.description: The latest hearing before the House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection revealed new details Tuesday about how former President Donald Trump pressured state officials to help him overturn the 2020 presidential election.

articles.author: Laurence H. Tribe, Dennis Aftergut
articles.title: Opinion: Republican election sabotage has already started. New Mexico is proof of that
articles.description: Republican election sabotage, in which GOP officials refuse to certify the winners, has started. It will be up to citizens to block it. We can do that at the ballot box and in other ways, write legal scholars Laurence H. Tribe and Dennis Aftergut.
